value.dsc: SPI present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
last message transmitted to the user for the track
first message transmitted to the user for the track
ADS-B data inconsistent with other surveillance information
track not resulting from amalgamation process
Military Emergency present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Military Identification present in the last report received from a sensor capable of decoding this data
Age of the last received track update is higher than system dependent threshold (coasting)
Age of the last received PSR track update is higher than system dependent threshold
Age of the last received SSR track update is higher than system dependent threshold
Age of the last received Mode S track update is higher than system dependent threshold
Age of the last received ADS-B track update is higher than system dependent threshold
Special Used Code (Mode A codes to be defined in the system to mark a track with special interest)
Assigned Mode A Code Conflict (same discrete Mode A Code assigned to another track
Track created / update with FPL data
Duplicate Flight Plan due to manual correlation

item.dsc: Mode 5 Data reports & Extended Mode 1 Code

value.dsc: Callsign or registration downlinked from target

item.name: TRK
item.dsc: Actual track age since first occurence

item.name: PSR
item.dsc: Age of the last primary detection used to update the track

item.name: SSR
item.dsc: Age of the last secondary detection used to update the track

item.name: MDS
item.dsc: Age of the last Mode S detection used to update the track

item.name: ADS
item.dsc: Age of the last ADS-C report used to update the track

item.name: ES
item.dsc: Age of the last 1090 Extended Squitter ADS-B report used to update the track

item.name: VDL
item.dsc: Age of the last VDL Mode 4 ADS-B report used to update the track

item.name: UAT
item.dsc: Age of the last UAT ADS-B report used to update the track

item.name: LOP
item.dsc: Age of the last magnetic loop detection

item.name: MLT
item.dsc: Age of the last MLT detection

item.name: MFL
item.dsc: Age of the last valid and credible Mode C code or barometric altitude from ADS-B used to update the track (I062/136)

item.name: MD1
item.dsc: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 1 code used to update the track (I062/110)

item.name: MD2
item.dsc: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 2 code used to update the track (I062/120)

item.name: MDA
item.dsc: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 3/A code used to update the track (I062/060)

item.name: MD4
item.dsc: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 4 code used to update the track

item.name: MD5
item.dsc: Age of the last valid and credible Mode 5 code used to update the track (I062/110)

item.name: MHG
item.dsc: Age of the DAP "Magnetic Heading" in item 062/380 (Subfield #3)

item.name: ACS

item.name: VUN

item.name: COM
item.dsc: Communications/ACAS Capability and Flight Status reported by Mode-S

value.dsc: Comm. A and Comm. B capability
Comm. A, Comm. B and Uplink ELM
Comm. A, Comm. B, Uplink ELM and Downlink ELM
No alert, no SPI, aircraft airborne
No alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground
Alert, no SPI, aircraft on ground

item.name: BPS
item.dsc: Barometric Pressure Setting (derived from Mode S BDS 4,0)

item.name: X
item.dsc: Estimated (i.e. accuracy standard calculated deviation) position of of a the target expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates.

item.name: Y
item.dsc: Estimated (i.e. accuracy standard calculated deviation) position of of a the target expressed in Cartesian co-ordinates.

item.name: APW
item.dsc: Estimated Accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated position of a target expressed in WGS-84

item.name: AGA
item.dsc: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated geometric altitude of a target

item.name: ABA
item.dsc: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated barometric altitude of the track

item.name: ATV
item.dsc: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated track velocity in Cartesian co-ordinates

item.name: AA
item.dsc: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated acceleration in Cartesian co-ordinates

item.name: ARC
item.dsc: Estimated accuracy (i.e. standard deviation) of the calculated rate of Climb/Descent of an aircraft
